void edu::stanford::atom::sti::client::tabbededitor::TabbedEditor::openFileInTab ( File  file,
int  tabIndex 
) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException [inline]

Generic open file method. If tabIndex is equal to the current number of open tabs (the current size() of the Vector of TabbedDoccuments) then a new tab is created and a new TabbedDoccument element is added to the Vector.

Parameters:
file The File to open
tabIndex The index in the JTabbedPane for the opened file
Exceptions:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException Throws an exception if tabIndex is less than zero or if tabIndex is greater than the size of the Vector of TabbedDocuments

void edu::stanford::atom::sti::client::tabbededitor::TabbedEditor::createNewFile (  )  [inline]

Creates a blank new document in a new tab with title Untitled#, where # is a number starting from 1 that increments each time a new file is made. The File associated with the newly created TabbedDocument is null.
